channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Working with problems
item.description: Situations have no solution, they’re not problems, they’re simply the way it is. Problems are distinguished by the fact that they have solutions. But ...

item.title: The Truth About The ‘New Year Comet’ ATLAS G3
item.description: Comet ATLAS G3 will be closest to the Sun on Jan. 13, 2025, but will mainly be visible only from the Southern Hemisphere.

item.title: Busy-ness and leverage

item.title: Surprise Google Chrome 131 Update For Windows, Mac, Linux, Android
item.description: Google has got 2025 off to a surprise start with an emergency security update for all Chrome browser users—update now.

item.title: How Fashion Brands Can Tap Into The Rise Of Independent Retail
item.description: In recent years, independent retailers have played an increasingly large role in the expansion of the fashion industry.

item.title: The system has fingerprints

item.title: Situational spending

item.title: How To Make Sure AI Regulation Gets Up To Speed
item.description: Regulating AI is an urgent matter, but doing so ineffectively will undermine progress, stifle innovation and sow distrust instead of quelling it.

item.title: The value of artifacts
